text: Pedro Nuno de Oliveira Santos (born 13 April 1977) is a Portuguese economist and politician, who is the Leader of the Opposition since 2024. He is also the Secretary-General of the Socialist Party since 2024. Before, he was Secretary of State for Parliamentary Affairs, from November 2015 to February 2019, and afterwards as Minister of Infrastructure and Housing, from February 2019 to January 2023.
